name: Dash (Gameboy)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2021. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby! This game is an entry for the GBJam9. (https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-9)

Original Story: If you need diamonds, call DASH the diamond hunter. Jump through six levels, avoiding enemies and collecting six diamonds per level, but be careful not to fall off the edge of the track.

Controls on original machine:

Start the game, pause: Start
Move: Cursor Keys (Left - Right)
Jump: B

Controls in the browser:

Start the game, pause: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys (Left - Right)
Jump: Ctrl, X
